page.title: 11Employment
page.content: To get a picture of the occupational and social class make up of our block 200 people were asked their job. The results were classified thus:- Professional/Managerial 4.9%; Clerical Supervisory l2%; Skilled 8.2%; Semi skilled l0.9%; Unskilled l7.5%; Part time 3.2%; Housewives 4.3%; Retired 4.9%; Not working l8.l%. The replies revealed some social class differences between communities in our block. While all those in managerial jobs lived in Whickham, 70% of semi skilled and 62.5% of unskilled workers lived in Lobley Hill. The proportion of those not working is the same for each area, but almost all the women who referred to themselves as housewives lived in Whickham. Only one person described themself as unemployed. Where did they live? Whickham of course!
